t: Replace a Damaged, Defective, or Broken Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: Visit Your Orders and we will let you know what your options are for damaged, defective, or broken items.

t: Limited Warranty for Amazon Private Brands - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you are eligible, a replacement order or refund will be issued, and you'll be given instructions for returning the defective Product, postage paid. Failure to ship the damaged part or Product back to us may result in your being charged for the replacement part or Product at full retail price.

t: Damaged or Defective Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you have received a damaged, defective or if you are not happy with the product quality, you can return or replace the product.

t: r/AmazonVine on Reddit: Amazon Responsible For Defective Products
Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.

t: Returning Faulty and Defective Items - Amazon Customer Service
s: Learn how to return a faulty or defective amazon item.

t: Federal regulator says Amazon can be held responsible for faulty goods sold on its marketplace
s: July 30, 2024 - Federal regulators have determined that Amazon can be held responsible for defective goods sold by third-party merchants on its online marketplace, rejecting the company's position that it's merely an intermediary between consumers and sellers.

t: Amazon Renewed Guarantee - Amazon Customer Service

That's why Amazon and its selling partners in the Renewed program back applicable products with the Amazon Renewed Guarantee. t: Amazon Renewed: Shop Refurbished, Pre-Owned and Open-Box Products
s: Products on Amazon Renewed have been inspected and tested by qualified suppliers to work and look like new, and come with a minimum 90-day supplier-backed warranty. Shop for smartphones, computers, laptops, tablets, home and kitchen appliances, game consoles, office products, and more.

t: A-to-z Guarantee - Amazon Customer Service
s: The A-to-z Guarantee protects you when you buy items sold and fulfilled by a third-party seller who provides their own customer service directly to you. It covers both the timely delivery and condition of your items. You can make a claim directly to Amazon, and our team will check if you're ...

s: Answer: Amazon has a very liberal return policy, and you can begin the return on the page that lists past orders. Click on the Return prompt, and follow the steps. t: Amazon Product Defect Injury
